title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Master your AWS carbon impact with the Customer Carbon Footprint Tool (AIM254)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用客户碳足迹工具掌握您的 AWS 碳影响 (AIM254)
abstract: Learn how to estimate your carbon footprint from using AWS services with the Customer Carbon Footprint Tool. You will hear about the latest features now available to all customers and how improved reporting can help you meet your environmental targets.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用客户碳足迹工具估算您使用 AWS 服务的碳足迹。您将了解现在向所有客户提供的最新功能，以及改进的报告如何帮助您实现环境目标。

presenter.name: Alexis Bateman (Sus)
presenter.title: Head of AWS Sustainability Tech & Operations
